Control Name: Establishes Policies and Practices—Policies and practices reflect expectations of competence necessary to support the achievement of objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Establishes Policies and Practices—Policies and practices reflect expectations of competence necessary to support the achievement of objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC1.4 COSO Principle 4: The entity demonstrates a commitment to attract, develop, and retain competent individuals in alignment with objectives.
